MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to replace a faulty transformer near to Braidenhill Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.11pm on Monday 1st February 2021.
